detail_desc: Sleeveless top in jersey with gathered elastication around the neckline and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves. Contrasting colour trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Long-sleeved tunic in an airy weave with a round neckline, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist and buttoned cuffs.
Short, round-necked sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves and a panel at the hem with a knot detail at the front and gathers at the back.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with gathers at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short flounced sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam with ties at the waist. Partly lined.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, small stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Longer at the back.

Sleeveless dress in lightweight cotton canvas with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that join at the back. Buttons down the front, narrow elastication at the top of the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
High-waisted, calf-length, pleated skirt in jersey with a slight sheen. Laser-cut edge at the hem. Unlined.
Short jumper in a soft, fine knit with shoulder pads, long, slightly wider sleeves with decorative gathers, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Padded ski gloves in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced palms and ribbed cuffs. One glove has a small zipped pocket on the upper. Reflective details. Thinsulate™ lining.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and zipped front pockets. Inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in stretch jersey crêpe with a V-neck and wrapover front with pleats at the bottom for a draped effect. Short cap sleeves and a seam and detachable belt with metal D-rings at the waist. Side pockets and gently tapered legs with pleats at the top. Unlined.
Maxi dress in a pleated weave. Narrow cut at the top, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Fully lined mesh bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Small bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with a detachable shoulder strap and flap with a magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring. Lined. Size 6x14x19 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Heart-shaped bag in imitation patent leather and imitation suede with a zip and shoulder strap at the top. Lined. Size 4x17 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist.

Jacket in soft fleece made partly from recycled polyester designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Top in washed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and deep armholes in a wide style with a decorative seam at the back. Raw-edge, rounded hem that is short at the front and longer at the back.
Shorts in patterned slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and taped trims around the legs.
Velour playsuit with lace details, a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and wide 3/4-length sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and wide wrapover legs with open sides.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Striped dress in viscose jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elastication around the top. Wide flounce at the top and hem.
Hairbands in elasticated cotton jersey. One with a sewn-on bow at the front and one with a decorative knot detail.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Jacket in soft thermal fleece with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, twisted side seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.

Sports kit with a pair of running gloves, a headband and a reflective armband. Gloves with uppers in windproof, functional fabric, wide ribbed cuffs with a reflective print and touchscreen-compatible material at the top of the thumb and index finger. Unlined. Headband in fast-drying functional fabric with reflective details and a fleece lining. Armband with a reflective print.

Set with a sleeveless romper suit and a long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned romper suit with a kangaroo pocket, press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch, and ribbed hems. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Scarf in patterned satin made from recycled polyester.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck front and back, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and concealed elastication under the bust.
Sunglasses with patterned plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Scarf in a soft rib knit.
Leggings in stretch imitation suede with an elasticated waist.
Padded gilet with a detachable, faux-fur trimmed hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

Body in lace and mesh with mesh-lined, triangular cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, an adjustable horizontal strap at the back and no fasteners. Lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that holds in and shapes the tummy. Deep opening at the top and ties at the back of the neck.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Sleeveless dress in a jacquard weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a very wide skirt with a tulle underskirt. Lined.
Cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband with hook-and-eye fasteners, and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Trainers in scuba fabric with imitation leather details, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a unique nursing feature, slightly wider neckline with ties, and short puff sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

Set in soft cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Two long-sleeved tops in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Long-sleeved top in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Two pairs of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. One pair of joggers in jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Narrow tie in a striped, textured weave. Width 6 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.

Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a fabric patch on the chest, a padded, lined drawstring hood and an adjustable tab with press-studs at the top. Two-way zip down the front with a chin guard and a wind flap with concealed press-studs. Chest pockets with a concealed zip, flap front pockets with concealed press-studs, concealed side pockets behind the front pockets and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Adjustable tabs with press-studs at the cuffs and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Felted wool beret.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Suit trousers in twill with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Straight wide legs with creases and extended hems to give the impression of wide turn-ups.
Hat knitted in soft wool.
Cargo trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaped knees.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Jacket in washed denim with metal buttons, a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side welt pockets. Buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved, straight-cut blouse in lace made from recycled polyester. Small stand-up collar, buttons at the back and at the cuffs.
Trousers in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist and wide, straight legs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with wooden buttons on one shoulder.
Knee-length, pattern-weave skirt with a concealed zip at the back and decorative buttons.
Flared vest top in crêpe viscose jersey with deep armholes.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high paper bag waist, belt with a metal buckle, and zip fly with a button.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Short-sleeved dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and asymmetric skirt. Lined.
Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Leggings in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Long dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and lower section of the skirt for added width. Lined.
Leggings in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a high elasticated waist and zip at the hems.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Long-sleeved jersey tops in a soft cotton blend. Slim fit.
